Title: Senior Manager, Software Engineering, Build Services - VALORANT
RoleDescription:
Riot engineers bring deep knowledge of specific technical areas but also value the opportunity to work in many broader domains. As a Senior Engineering Manager, you will gain organizational alignment by building a strong engineering vision and offering creative solutions to organizational design. Youll also serve as a mentor for a team of engineers and managers, overseeing performance management, growth opportunities, and accountability.
VALORANT is Riot's take on a character-based tactical shooter (for more info on VALORANT click here!). As a Senior Manager, Software Engineering (Build, Release, Operate) in VALORANTs Foundations area, you will lead multiple teams of engineers responsible for improving how VALORANT builds, delivers, and operates its live service game. Your responsibility will include the pipelines used to build and deliver the Unreal game client, Unreal game server, and game services platform globally, including to China. You will drive improvements to services development and observability, enabling teams to better own and continuously improve the reliability and operability of the services they own. In addition to teams across VALORANT, you will partner closely with teams across Riot and Tencent to reduce friction, ensure operational excellence, and ensure an amazing player experience. You will report to the Director of Engineering for the VALORANT Foundations area.
Responsibilities:

Lead and support a team of 1520 engineers and engineering managers across Los Angeles, Seattle, and Sydney, consisting of both individual contributors and people managers.
Oversee a combination of direct and dotted-line reports, working closely with a Senior Manager in Sydney to ensure alignment for shared responsibilities.
Partner with discipline and product leadership to shape product vision and define the technical direction that improves how VALORANT builds and delivers its Unreal game client, Unreal game server, and game services platform, and how it operates them continuously at global scale.
Collaborate effectively with geo-distributed teams across Riot and Tencent, adjusting schedules as needed to accommodate time zones.
Serve as a hands-on engineering leader, actively contributing across all phases of the product lifecycle, including implementation.
Raise technical standards and refine processes to drive more effective product delivery and operations.
Champion and model Riots values, setting the tone for your team and peers.
Contribute to the teams support rotation.

Required Qualifications:

6+ years professional experience as a software engineer working in services development roles.
4+ years as an Engineering Manager leading engineers and engineering managers.
Professional experience driving technical direction and influencing architecture at team of teams scale.
Expertise with C#, Java, Golang, or similar language(s).
Professional experience with Lean or Agile development processes (Scrum, Kanban, etc).
Professional experience working with cloud computing and cloud technologies.
Professional experience building large-scale backend systems or game services.

Desired Qualifications:

Professional or academic experience working with C++.
Professional experience working in a leadership role in a multi-geo organization.

Title: Senior Concept Artist

Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. In 2009, Riot released its debut title League of Legends to critical and player acclaim. As the most played video game in the world, over 100 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the League of Legends experience.
Were looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take play seriously; youre passionate about games. We embrace those who see things differently, arent afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints.
That's where you come in.

Understand and clearly articulate the products unique visual style, while supporting and maintaining that style
Consistently embody and practice company values in both work and collaboration.
Support team leadership in operational tasks while maintaining high standards of work quality
Assist in developing the skills of team artists, ensuring consistency of artistic style across the teams work

Proactively solve problems, pursue creativity with passion, and lead by example
